ComicInfo.Summary:
As war spreads across the Mediterranean, Robin's squadron find themselves battling the Germans in the skies over Italy. But with Antonio Valenzano attached as local liaison, Robin begins to understand his own country's complicity in Antonio's tragedy in part two of The Flower of My Heart, by Garth Ennis and Tomas Aira. Available with Regular, Wraparound Covers by Thomas Aria, Good Girl Nose Art and Battle Damage Premium Covers by Matt Martin.
